title: Most Popular Article integration tests
assertions: SELECT * FROM {{schema}}.top_articles_by_author WHERE Author like \'Jeff Hollan\'
SELECT AUTHOR FROM {{schema}}.top_articles_by_author GROUP BY AUTHOR HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT AUTHOR FROM {{schema}}.top_articles_by_author WHERE AUTHOR is null
SELECT READING_TIME FROM {{schema}}.top_articles_by_author WHERE READING_TIME > 1 OR READING_TIME < 0
